channel.title: trying-out on My Programming Escapades
channel.description: Recent content in trying-out on My Programming Escapades

item.title: Trying out Buffalo
item.description: I’m trying out a new concept: my “I should check this out” list of tools and technologies has grown quite a bit so I got the idea that I could do short write ups of my experimentation and first impressions to give myself motivation to try these things out. Will see how this turns out, hopefully this will turn out a series :) Today I’ll be trying out Buffalo - a Go web framework.
